name: MoodTrak
description: Track your daily moods and discover emotional patterns with MoodTrak. Log feelings in seconds, add custom tags, and visualize your mental wellness journey with beautiful analytics. All data stays private on your device. Simple, elegant, and insightful mood tracking for better self-awareness.

name: HabIT
description: Build habits with this app. It has streaks for motivation, a calendar to help you track your achievemnent and its simple and modern UI makes it easy to use. All data are stored on your phone and you can add your own custom habit you would like to build.
